thread.title: Mad Ants conclude weekend tryout camp
thread.title_full: Mad Ants conclude weekend tryout camp

title: Mad Ants conclude weekend tryout camp
text:
Mad Ants conclude weekend tryout camp 
By Dean Pantazi - 21 Alive October 18, 2015 Updated Oct 18, 2015 at 8:47 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, Ind. (21 Alive) - The Mad Ants wrapped up their two day tryout camp at the McMillen Center on Sunday. 
Of the 70 players who came out Saturday, only 20 were invited back for the second look on Sunday, one of them being former Mad Ant Bennie Lewis. 
As many as five players will be signed out of this tryout to a training camp tryout contract, vying for spots with returning Mad Ants players, assignees from the Indiana Pacers, and the Ants' D League draft picks. 
For more on this story click on the video icon.
